programme.title: ONE Championship Weekly - EP 49
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a celebration of true martial arts and its deep-rooted Asian values of humility, integrity, respect, honor, kindness, discipline, courage, and strength. Martial arts has been Asia's greatest cultural treasure for the last 5,000 years, and is a part of the daily fabric of society across the continent. Asia is home to the best martial artists on the planet. Our mission is to unleash real life superheroes who ignite Asia with hope, dreams, inspiration and strength.

programme.title: Best Of ONE Championship - EP 23
programme.desc: "Best of ONE Championship" features the best athletes, knockouts, submissions and action across the world's largest martial arts organization. Are you ready to discover the best of ONE?

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S8 - EP 11
programme.desc: Danny, still recovering from his gun shot wound, is telling his son Charlie a bed time story, while Steve and a group of veterans are hunting down some fake Santas who robbed a money truck.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent 11 - EP 1
programme.desc: Britain's Got Talent is a British television talent show competition and is now in its 11th season. Presented by Ant & Dec, it is a search for Britain's next best talent act and features singers, dancers, comedians, variety acts, and other talents of all ages.

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 30
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Everyday Gourmet presents can-do cooking ideas as well as tips, tricks and insights into making us all more confident in the kitchen. Justine believes when it comes to cooking, a little bit of confidence goes a long way, and she'll spend most of the time building up your confidence in the kitchen.

programme.title: Bondi Harvest With Guy Turland - EP 4
programme.desc: In this series, Guy Turland brings his popular style to the television screen for the first time. With his trademark fresh seasonal flavours, Guy, a local chef, surfer and free diver, shows us his unique blend of healthy, fresh and simple cooking inspired by the Aussie beach lifestyle.

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 15

Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: DinoCore - EP 0021 & 0022
programme.desc: "Baryon", the great Dino Master of Dino Star, is defeated by the evil "Darkno". Before he dies, he sends his three most trusted DinoCores: Tyranno, Saber and Stego, to Earth with the ancient guardian Dino Tuner. Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 10
programme.desc: In this finale, Jake's friends are in terrible danger and he feels he is to blame. All alone and powerless he must find a way to save them from Mr Smith, before Mr Smith becomes too powerful. With more questions then answers, Jake tries to find the mysterious "J" and his only clue is a compass that takes him on a long trail. But who is this "J" and will he be able to help Jake find new powers? And will Jake make it in time or will it be too late for our heroes? Watch now to find out.

programme.title: Vanishing Foods - EP 7
programme.desc: Among the four styles of cooking that make up Kyoto's cuisine, obanzai or traditional cooking is the least known. Aun discovers that even as some of their dishes are served at restaurants and sold at stores, Kyoto residents are losing the knowledge and skill to cook what they call soul foods.

programme.title: Akram Khan's Giselle - English National Ballet

programme.desc: Zhanfeng attempts to drive a wedge between Dao Wuxia and An Ye Luo by deliberately telling An Ye Luo that Yinxue is at Flaming Hill. An Ye Luo wonders why was he not informed of such an important matter. (PG)战枫为了挑拨刀无暇与暗夜罗的关系，故意告诉暗夜罗银雪在烈火山庄。暗夜罗懊恼为何裔浪和刀无暇为何没向他禀报此事。.

programme.title: 阴差阳错 Zero To Hero - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Cast: Edmund Chen, Chen Li Ping, Yao Wen Long, Patricia Mok, Florence Tan and Zheng Ge Ping. (重)演员：陈志财，陈莉萍，姚玟隆，莫小玲，郑各评。.

programme.title: 阿公你的名字好难叫 My Grandpa - EP 6
法网情天 Hidden Truth - EP 0021 & 0022
甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 0055 & 0056
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 小村大任务 Mission Possible - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Together with experts, the host will venture into the rural areas where people live in poverty and observe what the locals do for a living. Focusing on available resources, the expert then designs a 3-day workshop for the locals, with the goal to inspire and teach them how to improve their handicraft skills and increase their productivity. In the long-run, it is hoped that their standard of living will be improved. (重) (本地综艺节目) 本节目透过主持人，带领专家深入贫困、落后的地区，了解当地居民赖以为生的技能，并以当地材料，给居民设计为期三天的课程，启发和教导他们如何改良手工艺，籍此提高生产力和竞争力，长远而言可以改善生活。.

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 0067 & 0068
programme.desc: (R) We never knew that the best of nasi lemak and the quirkiest folks could be found in Holland V... Recapture the aroma with the encore telecast. (重)新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。.

programme.title: 小农夫 Fresh Farmers - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Fresh Farmers is a an info-ed series that fosters bonding through farming activities.Taken out of their modern lifestyle and leaving their dandy gadgets at home, two sets of schoolmates find themselves ready for some fun-filled farm activities. (重)小农夫是一个通过务农活动增进亲子关系的儿童资讯娱乐节目。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 67

programme.title: 快乐火柴 Magic Match Sticks - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Tiger, Jielun and Feifei are best friends. Lingling, the trio's study group leader finds them her worst nightmare because they are not interested in their studies. One day, Tiger meets a scientist who gives him a box of "happy matchsticks" which gives the trio whatever they desire. However, as soon as the fire on the matchstick extinguishes, their wishes and illusions vanish. Lingling urges them to stop by telling them that the desires are just illusions, and wants them to face reality and work hard. Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)孩子们都充满梦想，渴望不费吹灰之力能达成。可是再完美的梦，也是虚假。本剧教导孩子们不应沉迷美梦，不要期待神奇力量降临，不要依赖父母的给予、别人的帮忙，应该将梦想付诸行动，凭自己的努力，开拓自己的丰盛人生。.

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: The Young Xiao Shiye is known for his strong sense of justice and integrity. He uses his wisdom and wit to solve the people's daily problems and many challenges. 小师爷真名施野，极富侠气和正义感。日常生活中，用自己的智慧和勇气，克服各种困难，帮周围的人解决了大大小小的麻烦，维护了正义和公理。.

programme.title: Astro经典名曲歌唱大赛 2018 Classic Golden Melody 2018 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The Classic Golden Melody is an annual singing competition organised for contestants aged 45 years and above. Root for your favourite contestant as we bring you this exciting contest! (重)《经典名曲歌唱大赛》是大马电视史上最高规格及收视率的中文歌唱比赛，为45岁以上的歌唱好手提供实现舞台梦想的平台。我国也派出参赛者到彼邦挑战，竞争激烈。.

programme.title: 味道 (第八季) Food And Beverage Investigators S8 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Food and Beverage Investigators is a travelogue on cuisines, which leads the audience to find new, strange and special delicacies in the destinations from the perspective of a traveller so that they can experience them for themselves. (重)内容围绕中国及世界各地的美食、及美食背后的风俗文化展开；由主持人及美食家、美食爱好者组成“味道调查团"踏遍各地寻找美食，展现各异的饕餮美食，有趣的民风民俗。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. (重)这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 挑战不可能 4 Challenge The Impossible 4 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Sa Beining, Challenge The Impossible (Sr 4) presents exciting challenges taken on by daredevils from around the world. The panel of judges include Li Changyu, Sun Yang and Dong Qing. Tune in to see who among the contestants will win the approval of the judges. (重)励志挑战节目《挑战不可能 第四季》由撒贝宁担任主持人，节目呈献难度极高且不可思议的各种挑战，将给观众带来惊心动魄的感官体验。节目也邀请华人神探李昌钰，中国奥运游泳冠军孙杨和著名艺人董卿担任评委。.

programme.title: 大厨你在家吗 ! Hey Chef! - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) "Hey Chef!" will drop a surprise visit on our well-loved chefs and raid their refrigerators. Then the challenge will be on the chefs to see how they can make use of whatever ingredients inside the refrigerators to whip up a simple yet delicious meal within 20 minutes. (重)大厨在酒店餐馆指挥若定，率领团队烹煮一道道的山珍海味，但是听说他们因为工作太忙碌了，在家都几乎不下厨！那他们off day 又会做什么呢？这个全新的大厨烹饪节目以此为出发点，每集由其中两位主持人趁大厨off day，到他们的家进行突击，看看他们在毫无准备的情况下如何临危不乱，巧用家里有限的食材，即兴煮出一桌简单又美味的家常菜！.

programme.title: 大英雄 Hero - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: (R) After three years, Big Brother returns to Dakota to find that things have changed. Upon reaching home, the unkempt Jin Xuan opens the door for him. Grandma Swordswoman becomes much older and not as lively. There is also a three year old boy at home. Everyone asks him for money. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)转眼三年过去，大哥大又回到达哥打弯，却发现人事已非。回到家时，首先来开门的是蓬头垢面的金萱，原本生龙活虎的侠女阿嬷变得又老又残，随时要倒下一样，屋子里还多了个三岁的小男孩，大家都争着跟他伸手要钱….

programme.title: 狮城6点半 Singapore Today - EP 53
programme.desc: (Live) Daily updates on local news headlines and stories. （现场直播）《狮城6点半》每日为您提供最全面的本地新闻头条与报道。.

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 0337 & 0338
programme.desc: Ep337-Youtu asks Lihua to transfer 50 million dollars from her company to tide over the short term fund shortage in his construction company, but the latter turns him down. Meanwhile, Junnan asks Jiahui to return to the Chen Hospital. However, Jiahui rejects the offer. Ep338-Youtu's creditor comes to Jincheng's house and asks him to repay Youtu's debt. However, Jincheng refuses to settle it. The creditor is very angry and kidnaps Jincheng soon after. Both Youchun and Guizhi are shocked. (PG)第337集-有土要丽华拿出五千万为他解决建造公司的周转问题，但丽华坚拒。其间，俊男邀请家辉回去陈综合工作，家辉婉拒。第338集-有土的债主到梁家要金城马上解决有土的债务，金城不允，债主即把金城绑走。有纯和桂枝都感到十分震惊。.

programme.title: 空中访民情 A Conversation with Minister 2019 - EP 2
programme.desc: The new series of "A Conversation with Minister" brings together Ministers, Senior Minister of State, Senior Parliamentary Secretary and guests to discuss issues such as education, employment, health, family and economy that are close to the heart of every Singaporean. The Ministers will also respond to views expressed by the public in street interviews. Helmed by Radio Presenter Lim Leng Kee and News and Current Affairs presenter Soh Bee Lan, "A Conversation with Minster" will make its debut this Saturday on TV and is also available on radio and our digital platforms. 新系列《空中访民情》，邀请政府部门的部长、高级政务部长、高级政务次长，以及嘉宾们共聚新传媒园区，以轻松的聊天方式讨论教育、就业、健康、家庭和经济等课题。部长也会在节目中，解答民众通过街头访问提出的反馈。这系列共有六集，由电台广播员林灵芝和时事节目主持人苏美兰主持，并将通过多平台呈献给观众、听众和网民。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 周六影院: 红海行动 Saturday Cinema: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a Chinese cargo ship gets attacked by pirates off the coast of Somalia, the Chinese Navy deploys the elite Jiaolong assault team led by Yang Rui (Zhang Yi) to handle the situation. Though the rescue operation is successful, the team's primary sniper sustains a critical injury. Afterwards, the Jiaolong team, along with headstrong replacement sniper Gu Shun (Johnny Huang), is sent to the African nation of Yewair, which has fallen into civil warfare. (PG13-暴力镜头).

programme.title: 周六影院: 红海行动 Saturday Cinema: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a Chinese cargo ship gets attacked by pirates off the coast of Somalia, the Chinese Navy deploys the elite Jiaolong assault team led by Yang Rui (Zhang Yi) to handle the situation. programme.title: 六扇门 The Door - EP 0037 & 0038

To prevent this from happening, Zhao Wuji writes to inform the Emperor that he has an elder son born of Consort Wan while Zhu Jianyi goes in search of the missing crown prince. (PG)(重)皇上决定册封薛皇后之子为太子，令朱见溢深感失望。为了阻止这件事，赵无极密函皇上，告以万贵妃所生之大太子，至今仍然健在人间。另一方面，朱见溢则派人倾力寻找大太子，以备继承大统。.

programme.title: 国记交意所 It's A Small World - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) "It's A Small World" is a show in a classroom setting where the participants are Mandarin speaking foreigners who act as students. They exchange their opinions and experiences that they had in different countries. They discuss on topics such as fashion, art and music, geography, policies, traditional practices, social phenomenons and such to the best of their Mandarin knowledge. Often the participants mispronounce Mandarin words, to the joy and laughter of others! (重)主持人李国煌担任"讲师"，带领各国"学生"趣谈新加坡独特语言与文化。他们也会研究各国人民如何看待某些课题。.

programme.title: 真命小和尚 The Royal Monk - EP 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: (R) The story revolves around a lively eight-year-old monk named Happy. He started his life at Shaolin Temple, his wit and lively personality made him the abbot's favourite. His only desire is to reunite with his mother. (重).

programme.title: 名人。心货 Celeb's Curated Collections - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) This episode we enter the home of Jin Yin Ji as she donates a very interesting item. Shane Pow shares about his growing up process and donates his precious bicycle - a present he bought for himself for his 21st birthday. Taiwanese hairstylist Wu Yi Lin donates the precious branded heels Pauline Lan gave to her. (重)这一期有机会走进金姐古色古香的特色家居，她送出心货趣味高于价值，也抖落无间断的幽默；八公子之一的包勋评滔滔不绝，分享自己成长，他送出的心货之一是：脚踏车，那是21岁生日自己送自己的礼物，背后有难忘的经历和回忆；台湾明星发型师吴依霖远道而来，为何舍得把好友蓝心湄送她的名牌高跟鞋割爱，听她道出姐妹淘情深和隐含的心意。.

programme.title: 石器时代: 寻找传说中的宠物 Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 0001, 0002, 0003 & 0004
programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 1
programme.desc: Chinatown is Singapore's largest historic district, embedded with traditional Chinese culture. But did you know that the famous Thian Hock Keng temple once held the calligraphy bestowed by a Qing dynasty Emperor? What unique murals lies within the vicinity of Chinatown? Let's head down to Chinatown to explore! (首播)新加坡的牛车水历史悠久，是大家熟知的华人社区。但你们是否知道，天福宫里头曾经藏有清朝皇帝亲自题字的匾额吗？牛车水一带又到底藏匿了哪几幅有关早期新加坡人生活的壁画呢？跟随我们的两位搜密组员的脚步，好好了解牛车水！.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. Through the ceaseless searching of survival methods, we have found ourselves economic opportunities, city building and management skills, and also food sources. (重)新加坡是一个弹丸小国，天然资源匮乏。这些年来新加坡之所以能立足于世界的大舞台，并且展露光芒，正因为新加坡多年来不断的掌握先机，不断的寻找新边际； 无论是开拓更多新食源、或是输出城市建设、改造与管理经验，新加坡都不遗余力，勇往直前。.

programme.title: 陪你走千里 With You, A 1000 Miles - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "With You, A 1000 miles" is a cross platform doc-reality format program that will audition, select and track the 1000 miles journey of a pair of father-son or husband-wife or brother-sister or grandparent-grandchildren or close friends, as they undertake the life transforming road trip of their lives. (重)《陪你走千里》是个写实记录节目。节目会以面试的方式选取一对情侣／父子／夫妻／姐弟／祖孙，并跟随他们参与一场长达千里，改变人生的旅程。.

programme.title: 我在你左右 With You - EP 0009 & 0010
programme.desc: (R) Wen-an gets involved in a minor accident with Zhang Yang and tries to stop the latter from leaving to no avail. Zhang Yang gets killed in another accident almost immediately. Wen-an becomes his only "bridge". (重)主演：彭耀顺饰周文安；陈汉玮饰张扬；瑞恩饰叶思琪；潘淑钦饰赵美香；黄炯耀饰张伟；鹤天赐饰张焕；陈澍城饰张永盛。.

programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Our protagonist master Song is one of the last few traditional shoemakers in Singapore, he devoted himself to this industry 63 years ago, there have been peaks and glory, but now he is struggling when industry is fading away in the face of industrial production. (重)本周，节目主持人李心钰来到黄金大厦。本期店主宋师傅是新加坡所剩不多的手工鞋匠之一，他在63年前加入了这个行业，有过高峰有过辉煌，但最后在手工行业逐渐没落的趋势下，他的店也慢慢地越变越小。让我们一起来看看他开朗的一面，以及他对手工制鞋的骄傲。.

programme.title: 才华横溢出新秀2019 前奏 Star Search 2019 Preview - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Intensive training will take place and Top 24 will have the opportunity to develop their acting skills under the coaching of various veteran instructors. In this key episode, "Star Coach" Chen Han Wei, Huang Bi Ren and Christopher Lee will select their talents and team up to proceed to the next round. (重)新秀们开始进行集训，不同的导师来教导不同的课程，分享他们的心得。星级导师陈汉玮、黄碧仁、李铭顺，将在这关键的一集，甄选他们各自看好的新秀，组队迎战。.

programme.title: 大英雄 Hero - EP 0021 & 0022

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 4
programme.desc: Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. Through the ceaseless searching of survival methods, we have found ourselves economic opportunities, city building and management skills, and also food sources. 新加坡是一个弹丸小国，天然资源匮乏。这些年来新加坡之所以能立足于世界的大舞台，并且展露光芒，正因为新加坡多年来不断的掌握先机，不断的寻找新边际； 无论是开拓更多新食源、或是输出城市建设、改造与管理经验，新加坡都不遗余力，勇往直前。.

(重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) A strange little girl appears in Aidan's house and claims to be his daughter. Aidan doesn't believe it. The next morning, Aidan's wakes up to find the little girl missing and thinks it was a dream. Aidan bumps into NadiaLin Mei Lingon his first day of work and she mistaken him for being a lecher. (PG)(重)陌生小女孩出现Aidan家中，坚称自己是Aidan的女儿；Aidan不信。次日，Aidan睡醒，见女孩消失无踪，以为是梦。Aidan第一天上班，遇见了Nadia（林美玲），被对方误会是色狼。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Philippines is infamously known as "The Asian Base of Black Market for Guns", the proliferation of illegal guns has posed a great threat to its national security. How do the trade-offs between legal and illegal gun dealers affect the disputes between drug gangs and political parties in Philippines? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)菲律宾 - 黑枪世界 拥有“西太平洋明珠”美誉的菲律宾，有着另一个不名誉的绰号“亚洲黑枪基地”。非法枪支泛滥对菲国治安构成极大威胁。合法枪械买卖商和非法枪商之间的权衡关系，如何影响菲律宾的毒品帮派和政党纠纷呢？.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 27
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen is puzzled and embarrassed when he hears from Guixi that his family has accepted her money. Yuzhen and his family discover later on that Ailan has taken the money for Haocai. Rongxin is blamed by Zhufeng for helping Ailan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真跟贵熙见面时听说艺苑的母亲曾经给他们一笔钱。宇真的家人这才发现爱兰瞒着秀子把钱拿走了。洙峰只容心是爱兰的共犯，把容心赶出家门。容心躲进海秀等人的房间里。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Shimei and gang do not dare to return home when they hear Zhufeng quarrelling with his family. They look up Haixiu at the hospital canteen. Yiyuan sees the gang eating leftover food from the kitchen and reprimands the canteen staff condescendingly. Shimei scratches Yiyuan's car out of anger. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)世美等人知道洙峰和家人又吵架了，所以不敢回家。众人肚子饿，于是到医院餐厅找海秀。厨房长让孩子们吃剩下的食物，碰到艺苑前来，骂了厨房长一顿。世美觉得艺苑狗眼看人低，出口顶撞她。世美不甘心被艺苑当成乞丐，把艺苑的车刮花。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Sharon learnt that Cui Zhixun is Haila's ex-boyfriend. Cui Zhixun regrets jilting Haila. Sharon attempts to revamp Zhixun's image to help him capture Haila's heart again. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雪伦从崔志勋口中得知他是海拉的前男友。崔志勋后悔把海拉甩掉。雪伦于是尝试帮志勋改变形象追回海拉。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Pu Zhemin gives Bai Xi the ring she wants and then asks her to arrange a meeting between himself and his ex-lover, Sharon. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)朴哲民送给白熙她想要的戒指，并然后要她安排让他和雪伦见面。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 23
programme.desc: Shengzhu tells Eric that she has decided to take charge of Wu He's documentary filming again. Shengzhu's mother's eyes sparkle when she learns that Wu Zuodou is Wu He. However, Shimi says Shengzu's mother and Shengtai caused Shengzhu and Zuodou to break up. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠告诉艾瑞克，她打算重新负责吴赫的记录片。当胜珠的母亲知道吴作斗就是吴赫后，眼睛立刻发亮。但世弥却说她和胜泰的存在，是害胜珠和作斗分手的主要原因。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 24
programme.desc: Shengzhu finds out that Zuodou, for her sake, has overcome his psychological barrier and braced up to drive her back to Seoul. She is very touched. Shengtai complains to Tingwei that working is tough. Tingwei asks him to endure for the kid's sake. Zuodou is very happy when Shengzhu informs him first thing after she gets her new mobile phone. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)当胜珠知道作斗是为了自己才克服心理障碍,鼓起勇气开车来接她回首尔的，心里十分感动。胜泰向庭薇抱怨打工辛苦，庭薇要他为了孩子而忍耐。胜珠办了新手机后第一个通知作斗，让他开心不已。艾瑞克见状，不免吃醋。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Donghao suspects the real murderer is Nan Guiwan. He got someone to covertly capture on video Guiwan admitting he killed Zhenya. This proved his suspicion. When Guiwan discovers that he has been filmed unknowingly, he offers Donghao a high price to buy the video clip but Donghao refuses. Zhenyu and Renya sneak into Guiwan's villa to find clues of Zhenya's murder. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东浩怀疑真正的凶手是南圭万，他命人去偷拍到了圭万说他杀死贞雅的视频，进一步证实了他的猜测。当圭万发现了被偷拍后，要花高价钱向东浩买下视频，但东浩不肯。振宇与仁雅偷偷潜回圭万的西村别墅寻找贞雅遇害的线索。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Popstars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Some food for thought this week. Peifen must work for her munchies, by finding out the origins of some of Singapore's most popular dishes. What is that rumoured love story behind the Yam Basket Ring dish? Who are the Four Heavenly Kings our culinary scene? What's Singapore's connection to the evergreen Lo Hei dish that you gulp down during Chinese New Year? (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. (重)《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) For some years now, a mobile horse library helmed by a stable hand has been making its rounds around the villages of Serang. It's almost a quixotic quest to tackle Indonesia's low literacy by encouraging reading. Host Khai Saharom joins Ridwan Sururi in this endearing and noble effort to bring books to the villagers. On his journey, he meets Lasmi, a very shy young autistic girl whom Ridwan has successfully taught to read. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Dian Xiao Er and Pu Tien are well known amongst Singaporeans but how well do they fare outside of our shores? In this episode, Bjorn travels to Shanghai to see if these two local popular restaurant chains can survive and thrive in the huge China market. (重)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan is shocked when she realizes that the security officer at her office building is Yuzhen's father. Her attitude towards Wancai changes immediately. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑听说宇真的父亲到医院找他，本来想打招呼，却发现宇真的父亲原来是公司大楼的警卫，而且两人之前还曾经有过冲突。艺苑知道万才的身份后，对他的态度大大地改变。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Xizhen is misled into thinking that Yuzhen has already proposed to Yiyuan. She tells Xiuzi about Yiyuan's family background and suggests that Xiuzi meets with Guixi quickly to discuss about wedding issues. Xiuzi makes a fool of herself when she meets Guixi. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)熙真以为宇真向艺苑下跪求婚了，于是立刻告诉秀子艺苑的家庭背景，并提议秀子立刻去跟贵熙见面，商讨他们的婚事。秀子与贵熙见面，丑态百出，被贵熙看不起。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Bai Xi gives Xiuhao the ring that belongs to him and Haila in their past lives. Sharon wants to stay in Xiuhao's place for a month. Xiuhao reluctantly agrees. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)白熙把秀浩与海拉前世拥有的戒指还给秀浩。雪伦要求暂住在秀浩家一个月，秀浩无奈答应她。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Xiu Hao tells Bai Xi that Pu Zhemin is the culprit behind his father's death. Meanwhile, Sharon searches for past articles of the lab fire accident Xiuhao's father to get close to Xiuhao. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩告知白熙朴哲民是暗杀他父亲的凶手。雪伦为了接近秀浩，特意搜寻秀浩父亲实验室纵火事件的报道,还故意编造故事引起他的关注。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 25
programme.desc: Shengzhu and Wu He's relationship needs to be kept a secret as Shengzhu plans to produce Wu He's documentary. Zuodou sends Shengzhu home and makes all kinds of excuses to stay. Shengzhu initially has the intention to ask Zuodou to stay. However, Shengzhu quickly asks him to hide and leave when her mother appears. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠准备制作吴赫的纪录片，俩人的情侣身份因此必须保密。作斗送胜珠回家，找换灯泡等各种理由不肯离开。胜珠本也有意留作斗下来，但见到母亲出现，便连忙要他躲起来，并找机会快点离开。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 26
programme.desc: Eric helps to keep Shengzhu and Wu He's love affair under wraps even though he is jealous of Wu He. Shengtai's hard earned money is used to buy pizza for Tingwei. Shengtai's mother is furious when she knows about it. Canxi steals the video clip of Wu He confessing to Shengzhu and passes it to CEO Hong. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)艾瑞克虽然嫉妒吴赫，但也暗中保护着胜珠和吴赫的恋情以免曝光。胜泰辛苦打工赚钱，却只记得买披萨给庭薇吃，胜泰母知道后非常生气。灿希假借替胜珠搬摄影机为由，偷偷找出吴赫向胜珠告白的片段交给洪代表。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) When Nan Rihao found out his son had killed Zhenya, he approached Donghao and offered Donghao money not to represent Zaihe in the case. Donghao rejects Nan Rihao. He wants to expose the scandal committed by the heir of the Rihao Group and asks Nan Guiwan to give himself up before the trial. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)南日浩得知儿子杀害贞雅的事后，去见东浩要给他钱要求不要为载赫辩护，但东浩拒绝了，他要让所有的人都看到日浩集团继承人的丑行，只想南圭万在审判之前去自首。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Japan, ramen is a popular form of fast food, with more than 130,000 ramen shops in Tokyo alone. What secrets enable chain stores and independent shops to stand out in amongst the competition? Undisclosed soup recipes, noodle-making techniques, or the relentless search for the best ingredients? (重)日式拉面五花八门，是日本上班族能快速填饱肚子的快餐。单单在东京就有超过13万家拉面店，所以各家必须使出浑身解数才能突围而出。连锁店和独立店家要在白热化的竞争中占有一席之地，究竟采用了什么杀手锏？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) There is a saying "Daughters are like split water"! But now, it seems otherwise. Men are caught in between the mother-in-law and wife, does it mean that women are taking mightier role in marriage? Is it true that having daughter is better than having son? Let's hear from Ian Fang and the guests! (重)人家说"女儿是泼出去的水" ！现今社会，是不是儿子才是泼出去的水？男人常被夹在婆媳关系之间，这代表女人在婚姻中的强势地位吗？如今，是不是生女儿更"划算"？新一代小生方伟杰和为人父母的嘉宾们一一给你剖析！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 58
programme.desc: (R) Everyone assumes that Xiuqing wants to reconcile with Zhenshu when she moves back into Zhenshu's house. Unknown to all however, Xiuqing plans to torment Zhenshu slowly. She criticizes and scolds Zhenshu behind Xiantai's back. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿决定搬回真淑家。大家以为她要跟真淑和好，但秀卿其实想慢慢折磨真淑。秀卿在贤泰面前表现得要跟真淑好好相处，私底下却对真淑口出恶言，一直伤害真淑。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu, Enhe and others have a meeting to analyze the evidence currently on hand. They conclude that Xianxiu is the most likely suspect in Xijun's murder. As the law firm does not have any right to search, Enhe volunteers to seek help from Youjing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智旭和恩赫等开会分析了目前的各项证据后，得出结论贤秀是杀死熙俊最可疑的人，但由于律师事务所没有搜查权，恩赫便自告奋勇去找宥静帮忙。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 73
programme.desc: Zhi-an blames Daojing for not telling her how Yanghao had bullied Taixiu and thinks Daojing is selfish for wanting her to accept his love without considering her position. Zhi-an returns the necklace to Daojing and wants him to forget her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安怪道京明知阳浩令太修受委屈却没有跟她说，让她跟打她父亲的人的孙子谈恋爱。知安觉得道京很自私，把项链还给道京，并要道京忘了她。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 74
programme.desc: Mingxi is shocked to find out that Zaicheng has been suffering from long-term depression. Mingxi apologises to Zaicheng and begs for his forgiveness. Shuxian tells Zhihao about her feelings for him. Zhihao likes Shuxian too, but both of them decides to remain as friends. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙发现载成原来长期被忧郁症折磨。明熙开口挽留载成，向他道歉。载成原谅明熙。书贤向知浩表白。两人虽然对彼此有爱意，但知道门不当户不对会很复杂，最后决定只做朋友。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 3
programme.desc: Aidan finally realizes after Xiao Hong is proven to be his daughter that he really does have the ability to turn all his lies into the truth. So he starts lying to his advantage and even uses this ability to clinch an important deal for the company, impressing both his Boss and immediate superior. De Hua questions Aidan why he did not think of wishing himself a million dollars. Aidan lies to De Hua that he will pick up a million dollars and the next day, Aidan does come across the chance to... (PG)Aidan恍然小红原来是自己谎言‘所生’的孩子后，证明了自己有让谎话成真的能力！于是，Aidan开始利用谎言，让自己无往不利，更替公司争取到一个重要的广告商机，令上司明烈对他刮目相看。德华不解Aidan为何不撒谎让自己拥有一百万？一言惊醒梦中人，Aidan于是对德华撒谎说自己将捡到一百万，隔日，Aidan果然在路上捡到了一百万！可是。。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 11
programme.desc: Zhiying plans to kill Shanmei to eliminate Devil King's suffering. Ba Jie alerts Devil King when he hears of Zhiying's plan. Devil King appears in the nick of time to save Shanmei from being stabbed by Zhiying. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)志英为了帮魔王去除体内的毒素，想刺杀善美。八戒知道志英的计划后赶紧通知魔王。魔王及时出现，为善美挡了一刀。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) What's the experience of studying in the prestigious University of Tokyo? How does a Singaporean girl cope with her voice talent course in Tokyo? What's the daily life of an overseas student in Tokyo? This episode, host Quan Yi Feng is in Tokyo to take a look at the life of the overseas students. (重)新加坡留学生在世界级的名校东京大学求学是怎样的体验？在东京攻读声音演员文凭的新加坡女生如何克服障碍追寻梦想？ 东京留学生的日常生活是怎么样的呢？这一集主持人权怡凤前往东京体验本地留学生的求学生活。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 59
programme.desc: (R) Fengyao Company offers to buy over KP Group. Xiantai advises Yinghao to make his decision after meeting the head of Fengyao Company. However, Yinghao is in need of finances to steer the company away from bankruptcy. Yinghao sells KP Group to Fengyao Company, not knowing who the real owner of the company is. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)丰耀公司向KP集团提出收购案。贤泰建议英鎬在见过丰耀的代表后才作决定，但英鎬担心资金没有及时到位会导致公司破产，于是在收购合约书上签名。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Fengxi's friend Yanyu has been assaulted by her ex-boyfriend. Fengxi and her colleague investigate the case. Enhe meets up with the eyewitness of the assault and finds out where the weapon has been hidden. Meanwhile, Chief Fang finds the contact person related to Xianxiu's case. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉熙的朋友妍禹被她的前男友袭击，奉熙和她的同事着手调查这起案件。恩赫与当天的目击女证人见面，获悉行凶凶器藏在何处。与此同时，方股长找到与贤秀案子有关的联系人。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 75
programme.desc: Taixiu's family holds a guitar recital for him in a park and invites his dear friends to the event. Taixiu passes away peacefully after the recital. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太修的家人带他到知泰之前办婚礼的公园办结他演奏会，还请来像家人一样的朋友们一起出席，为太修完成心愿。太修演奏完后坐在轮椅上安详去世。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 76
programme.desc: Mingxin asks Zhi-an to attend a match-making session on her behalf. Zhi-an is shocked to find out that the other party is Daojing. Daojing pretends not to know Zhi-an. He intends to woo Zhi-an all over again. (PG)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)明心拜托知安代替她去相亲。知安到场后发现相亲对象竟然是道京。原来明心早跟道京串通好了。知安之前说过要把道京当陌生人，所以道京假装不认识她，还认真地做自我介绍。道京说要重新追求知安。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 7
programme.desc: In the martial arts world of renowned novelist Jin Yong, not only are martial arts heroes awe-inspiring, but flavourful dishes also come to life. Host Michelle Chia visits Hong Kong to experience the taste of the unique cuisine favoured by our legendary heroes and their famous author. 在金庸笔下的武侠世界里，除了有武功高强的英雄人物、还有让人食指大动的美食。书中菜肴的描述，在字里行间让人垂涎，也激发厨师的创意。 这一集，主持人谢韵仪走访香港，品尝提供视觉与味觉双重享受的江湖美食。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 12
programme.desc: Dragon prince Yu Long loses his powers due to a punishment. He becomes an octopus and is being sold in a market. Wu Jing brings Yu Long to Devil King's house. Yu Long possesses Alice when he is unsupervised and demands Devil King to help him look for a mermaid or he will not leave Alice's body. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)东海龙王的二儿子玉龙因受罚，失去法力，结果变成章鱼被渔夫捕捉后被卖到市场去。沙悟净把玉龙带到魔王家。玉龙在没人看管的情况下附身在爱丽丝身上，并要求魔王帮他找人鱼。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu exposed the fact that Tai Long is the son of Fugui's enemy, He Ting Feng. Fugui was shocked to learn and refused to teach Tai Long. Tai Long had no choice but to leave the eatery and let the rest learn from Fugui. Fugui tasted a soup that Tai Long cooked and was shocked by the taste! (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) There was a shortage of 15,000 newborns and 1800 infant deaths in Taiwan last year. In remote villages, a kid's birth marks the start of a life battle. The imperfect medical system has left parents in helplessness and misery. Should the government have a serious take on the infant medical issues? (重)去年，台湾少了15000个新生儿，却有1800个孩子死亡，生得少，死得多。在偏乡，孩子从出生开始，就是一场人生战役。坑坑洞洞的儿童医疗网，让家长无奈孩子无法控诉，政府是否该正视儿童医疗资源不均的问题？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 60
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu slaps Xiuqing when the latter insults her for abandoning her family for another man. Zaiyong finds out that Minzhi owes the loansharks a big sum of money. He gives Minzhi a sum of money. In exchange, he wants Minzhi to update him with news of Jin Minxiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿指真淑当年跟别的男人外遇，抛弃家人，是个肮脏的女人。真淑忍无可忍，打了秀卿一巴掌。载永发现民植欠高利贷钱，于是私下拿出一大笔钱给他还债，但条件是要民植告诉他金民秀的消息。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Chief Fang is assaulted and wounded badly. He is sent to the hospital for emergency surgery. Zhixu guesses Xianxiu did it and asks Youjing to investigate Xianxiu. The emergency surgery saved chief Fang's life. Zhixu and others waiting outside the operation theatre feel relieved. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)方股长遭人袭击，伤重送院接受手术抢救。智旭猜是贤秀所为，请宥静调查贤秀。紧急施救终于让方股长逃脱了死神的手心，在手术室门外等候的智旭等众人这才放下心来。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 1
programme.desc: Hong Zhiyuan is looking desperately for a bone marrow donor to save her dying son, Hai Chen. She finds out that Ruli's bone marrow matches his. She seeks Ruli's father to help but the latter rejected her. (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)洪智媛儿子海成得了白血病,唯一能配上血型的就是孙如莉. 她拜托如莉的爸爸孙柱浩,希望他能答应女儿捐献骨髓，但是其爸爸却不愿意。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 2
programme.desc: Ruli's father, Sun Zhuhao, stops Zhiyuan from taking away Ruli for the operation. Both meet with an accident and Ruli's father died. Meanwhile, Daozi returned from the United States for a marrow donor blood test for his nephew. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉的爸爸孙柱浩阻止洪智媛把孙如莉带走,两人遭遇车祸, 孙柱浩身亡.同时, 具道治从美国回来,想捐献骨髓给外甥.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 1
programme.desc: Death is inevitable, but dying painfully can and should be avoided. In Mongolia, where cancer mortality rates are one of the world's highest, Danny Yeo meets palliative care doctors whom are fighting against system and social barriers, to help patients find meaning and comfort in "a good death". (首播)蒙古医疗资源紧张，可是临终护理一枝独秀。这跟蒙古有众多肝癌末期病人有关，更是“临终护理之母”敖登托雅教授努力的成果。杨君伟发现，临终部门的强力止痛针，对垂死病人尤其珍贵。临终护理，如何实现蒙古人的善终？.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 13
programme.desc: The Devil King arranges for Shanmei to meet Jonathan at his house, hoping that their reunion will drive Wu Kong mad. Wu Kong gets jealous when Jonathan shakes Shanmei's hand and hugs her. Wu Kong kisses Shanmei in front of everyone. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)魔王故意安排善美和乔纳森在他家见面，想让他们上演戏剧般的重逢，让悟空吃醋。悟空看到乔纳森和善美牵手和拥抱，果然觉得很不是滋味，于是上前强吻善美。.
